questions.question: What is the version of ComfyUI zfkun after the 2024-01-21 update?
questions.answer: The version of ComfyUI zfkun after the 2024-01-21 update is 0.0.8.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_zfkun

questions.question: What features were added to the Share Screen node during the 2024-01-06 update?
questions.answer: During the 2024-01-06 update, error tips were added for the Share Screen node, and Clip Area and Refresh Duration support were added.
questions.subject: Share Screen node

questions.question: What is the initial version of the Share Screen node?
questions.answer: The initial version of the Share Screen node is 0.0.6, as indicated by the 2023-12-24 update in the ChangeLog.
questions.subject: Share Screen node

questions.question: How can one install ComfyUI zfkun?
questions.answer: ComfyUI zfkun can be installed by first installing ComfyUI Manager and following the steps introduced there to install this repo, or by cloning the repo into the ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ directory and running pip install -r requirements.txt.
questions.subject: ComfyUI_zfkun

questions.question: What platforms are supported by the Text Translation node?
questions.answer: The Text Translation node supports translating text using the platforms baidu, alibaba, tencent, volcengine, and niutrans.
questions.subject: Text Translation node

questions.question: What is the Camera Capture Simple server used for?
questions.answer: The Camera Capture Simple server is mainly used with `Load Image Path` and `LCM` for real-time virtual live workflow.
questions.subject: Camera Capture Simple server

questions.question: What does Load Image Path node support for output image format?
questions.answer: The Load Image Path node supports `RGBA` for output image format.
questions.subject: Load Image Path node

questions.question: What are the features of the Share Screen node?
questions.answer: The Share Screen node features support for window, tab, screen sharing, multiple share nodes at the same time, custom clip area, custom refresh duration, and a default image in RGBA format.
questions.subject: Share Screen node

questions.question: What is the purpose of the Window Capture Simple server?
questions.answer: The Window Capture Simple server has a purpose of capturing window for **real-time virtual live** workflow, it is marked as WIP (Work In Progress).
questions.subject: Window Capture Simple server
